description: Determines where the stroke is positioned relative to the element bounds

INSIDE.impact_on_dimensions: None - stroke is inside the absoluteBoundingBox

CENTER.note: Half the stroke is inside, half outside
CENTER.impact_on_dimensions: Adds strokeWeight/2 to each side visually

OUTSIDE.impact_on_dimensions: None - absoluteBoundingBox does NOT include OUTSIDE strokes

critical_rules.rule: OUTSIDE strokes must use outline or box-shadow, NOT border
critical_rules.reason: border adds to element dimensions, outline/box-shadow don't

example.correct: width: 45px; outline: 2px solid blue; /* Total visual: 49px, box: 45px */
example.incorrect: width: 45px; border: 2px solid blue; /* Total box: 49px - WRONG! */

critical_rules.rule: Focus rings typically use strokeAlign: OUTSIDE
critical_rules.reason: Focus indicator shouldn't change element dimensions or layout
critical_rules.wcag: Focus must be visible but not disrupt layout (WCAG 2.4.7)
